data.title: Nothing special
data.text: I will never go back. Nothing very exciting to eat. I'm baffled how they are still in business. Make a sandwich at home it is cheaper

data.title: Very nice sandwich shop.
data.text:
I had soup and sandwich as a take-out. It is great to order online, including paying for it, and just dash in an grab the bag!  Each soup or sandwich I've had there has always been tasty.

For take-out, I wish they wouldn't automatically include a plastic soup. It is a small thing, but if you are taking it home that is just another piece of plastic to throw out.

data.title: Overpriced For What You Get
data.text: The sandwiches are good, and we  have visited Potbellys many times a year, but we try to avoid it now because the prices are jacked up.  When they first opened years ago, it was pretty comparable to the other sandwich shops in the area,  If you want twice the sandwich for the same price, go one block east, or two blocks west.

data.title: Delicious!!!
data.text: I had a hot sub- it was the best sub- hot or cold I have ever eaten! The perfect combination of toasted bread, seasonings, oil, mayo, veggies, and hot peppers with the meat was so tasty! I am looking forward to returning next time I am in Woodbury!

data.title: Great lunch spot
data.text: This is the perfect place to have a leisurely lunch and chat.  Interesting decor, friendly employees.  Toasty, hot, and tasty sandwiches.  I recommend...well, everything!  Even the PB&J is sure to please.

data.title: Average sandwich
data.text: My wife and I love trying different restaurants we saw potbelly 's online so we decided to try this place, we both ordered the wreck sandwich which has salami, roast beef, turkey and ham I thought it would be good but it was just average, the sub was heated up and looked good but I could get the same sandwich at subway, maybe mine didn't taste that good because I had mustard on it with onion, pickle, tomatoe, my wife liked her sandwich but she had mayo on hers I still say it was average at best, there are other sandwiches that look good so I will give this restaurant another try with a different  sandwich

data.title: Once Frequent Customer; No longer!
data.text:
Rarely do I write bad reviews but I am called to on this one.  Potbelly in Woodbury has horrible customer service!  Our malts were not filled to the top of the cup when we saw others with theirs filled to the brim.  When I asked about it, he said there is a fill line on a plastic cup.  I have yet to see the fill line.  

You lost a frequent customer.  We have visited this establishment for years but now will be going to Jersey Mike's for our sub needs and DQ for our malts.

data.title: Excellent sandwiches
data.text: Great place to get a sandwich. Love the tuna sub. The atmosphere is very laid back. Staff very friendly.

data.title: Delicious Sandwiches
data.text: The hot sandwiches and soup we ordered were delicious. The black bean soup was especially good. The service was a bit slow, and the person taking the order forgot one of the sandwiches, which held things up. However, the food was good and we'll probably return.

data.title: Fast and friendly
data.text: Always efficient and fast, this is the place to go for a quick, hot, tasty sandwich.  The salads are excellent too.
